environment.hardware: MacBook Apple M2 Pro, 16 GB Ram, macOS 15.6.1
environment.notes: Seeded via PerformanceSeeder; background load: low

k6_command_examples: APP_URL=https://solar-dev.test VUS=5 DURATION=30s k6 run tests/Performance/inverter.k6.js
notes: Refreshed after two consecutive Medium runs (VUS=5, 30s) with SQL logging enabled; p95 stable within tolerance across both runs (68.64ms, 68.39ms).
